name: elector
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who votes: In this election many 18-year-olds will become electors for the first time.
(in the US) a member of an electoral college (= a group of people whose job is to choose a political leader): The US President is officially elected by electors from each state, rather than by the popular vote.
